subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: DeMar DeRozan scored 30 points and Rudy Gay had 22 to lead the Toronto Raptors past the playoff-bound Hawks, 113-96, in Atlanta.
snippet: DeMar DeRozan scored 30 points and Rudy Gay had 22 to lead the Toronto Raptors past the playoff-bound Hawks, 113-96, in Atlanta.
